How could the Destrocons combine if Ramjet can't transform to his part? Rem=
ember Ignatius destroyed it with a point blank blast. (Besides it's about 1=
0 - 1 odds against Ignatius with the 10 REALLY upset about being trapped.)

ogroups.com
